activities: SendThisFile provides an online secure file transfer software where users can send large files via email, websites, APIs, or mobile devices. The software requires users to enter an email address at minimum, but dependent upon billing arrangements can also require names, company names, phone numbers, billing information and credit card information. This information is used to manage the user’s accounts and to provide support for the software.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program
